participant_1.background:
I am not too concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look my best for my girlfriend.
i love to go shopping.
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I'm not rich, but I enjoy playing fetch with my dogs and drinking Pepsi.
I sometimes miss my friends because I have a pet iguana that takes up a lot of my time.

participant_2.background:
Being true to myself and living my life authentically.
I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
I'm enjoying my retirement, spending time with my husband and helping others.
My favorite people are the ones who can appreciate my cooking.
I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.

content.text: I'm doing great, thanks for asking!
Me too, I'm just hanging out with my dogs.
That sounds nice. I'm spending time with my cats.
Aww, I love cats. I have a pet iguana.
Oh, that's interesting. I've never met anyone with a pet iguana.
Yeah, they're pretty cool. They're like lizards, but they're a little bit more personable.
That sounds really neat. I've always wanted a pet lizard, but I haven't had the space for one.
Well, if you ever get the chance, I highly recommend it. They're really fun pets.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely keep it in mind.
No problem! So, what are you up to today?

I'm just going to be hanging out with my cats and relaxing. I'm really excited for the weekend, though. I'm going to be treating my mom to her favorite fast food as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
That's so nice of you! I'm sure she'll appreciate it.
Thanks! I know she will. She's been through a lot, so I'm just glad that she's finally healthy again.
That's great to hear. I'm happy for her.
